convert PTM master list metadata to UBC herbarium list

Source: R/ptm_to_herbarium.R
ptm_to_herbarium.Rd

convert PTM master list metadata to UBC herbarium list

ptm_to_herbarium(ptm)

Arguments

ptm

list ptm numbers character)

Value

Examples

ptm_to_herbarium(c("120","230","300"))
